content: two very simple circular hats sized for newborns perfect for charity projects or to use up chunky yarn in your stash choice of two styles either fully ribbed or ribbed brim with stockinette body both are knit in the round from the brim up with crown decreases and sew through the last live stitches to cast off gauge for two by two rib hat 22 stitches x 20 row to make 10x10cm/ 4x4 unlocked gauge for stocking stitch hat 15 stitches x 24 row to make 10x10cm/ 4x4 unblocked other key info * one size only newborn * any chunky yarn will do i used approx 27g per hat 37m of recommended paintbox simply chunky yarn
